1172270.name: Red Embrace: Hollywood - Developer Commentary Book
1172270.description:
A 67-page developer commentary book for Red Embrace: Hollywood, discussing inspiration, the writing process, characters/endings, and more!

The digital book comes in PDF format, and can be opened via web browser or Adobe Reader.

Featured sections:

  • Writing methods
  • Inspiration
  • Characters
  • Endings
  • Quotes

Instructions:
  • Right click Red Embrace: Hollywood (must be installed) in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse Local Files”.
  • Open "Developer Commentary.pdf" in the main folder.
